summary: REQ-1 appears implemented via an updated central contact config exposing both phone numbers with correct display strings and tel: links, plus a backward-compatible primary phone field. REQ-2 appears implemented for TopBar, Footer contact area, and ContactSection contact-info via mapping over CONTACT_INFO.phones. REQ-3 is only partially evidenced: the ContactSection "Call Now" uses CONTACT_INFO.phone.tel, but there is no diff evidence that the header navigation "Call Now" CTA was updated/verified to use the primary phone after the config change.

missing_requirements.requirement: The "Call Now" button in the header navigation works and opens a tel: link for a valid phone number (deterministically the primary/first number) after adding the second phone number.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows ContactSection's "Call Now" uses CONTACT_INFO.phone.tel, but there is no change or snippet for the header navigation component to confirm it still points to a valid tel: link after the contact config was refactored.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions HeaderNav and CallNowButton but provides no code diff evidence)

hallucinated_features.description: Project tracking/state metadata changes (project_state.json) unrelated to the requested UI/config updates.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request adding/updating project state tracking files; it only requested contact config and homepage rendering changes.
BuildRequest did not request adding/updating documentation/summary artifacts; it only requested functional changes to contact configuration and homepage sections.
